pkgmetadata.longdescription:
PgBackMan is a tool for managing PostgreSQL logical backups created with pg_dump and pg_dumpall.
It is designed to manage backups from thousands of databases running in multiple PostgreSQL nodes, and it supports a multiple backup servers topology.
It also manages role and database configuration information when creating a backup of a database. This information is necessary to ensure a 100% restore of a logical backup of a database and the elements associated to it.
